Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I must admit I don't
normally do much fishing...
but I'll give it a go.
<PAGE>
And that doesn't mean 
I'm just going to let you win.
You'd better get ready.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is OK to be enthusiastic but
be careful not to hurt your finger
with the fishhook.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>My princess is somewhat
careless, so I worry about her.　
Besides...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Because you're all mine
 from head to toe.
I can't let you get hurt, now can I?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I suppose you already know... I won't
go easy because we're a couple.
<PAGE>
Although if you manage to beat me,
I'll do any one thing you
ask me to as a reward.
<PAGE>
You'll have a lot of time
during the Fest to think about it.
You should decide what I should do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Just be careful not to think about
me all the time while you're fishing
and let all the fish escape.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Where did I put my fishing rods?
If it wasn't for this kind of event,
I would barely ever go fishing.
<PAGE>
I should've got them before the Fest.
I suppose I could just think of it
as a handicap.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I mean...If I competed seriously
I'd have a good chance of winning.
A handicap will make the contest fair.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know fishing is a hobby
for some people.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But in my case, holding a rod
like this and staying completely still
just doesn't match my personality.
<PAGE>
I'd rather play with other people's
hair and keep my hands busy.
That's more up my street.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fishing?　Sounds fun!
I'll catch lots of fish!
You try your best as well!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<FACE_ROUGH>I won't go easy on you,
but I'm still rooting for you
to win!
<PAGE>
I hope you'll be
rooting for me, too!
<PAGE>
Let's both do our best
to catch lots of fish ♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a bit of a pity I have to
compete against you.
It's the spirit of events in this town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's not the winning that counts,
it's the taking part!
Let's not hold back ♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I wonder if there are any strange fish
we've never seen before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! Hey, <MYNAME>.
If we catch any interesting fish,
let's show each other, OK?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I think it's boring just catching
lots of fish in silence.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's that then.
It is a deal!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Though size doesn't count for the 
Fishing Fest, I'll still catch a big
one as I've made the effort to come!
<PAGE>
Hmm... I wonder, what's the size
of the biggest fish
you could catch in a river.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It would be amazing 
if there were fish so big that
you couldn't hold one in your hands!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I bet you're
really good at fishing.
<PAGE>
Let's both do our best
to catch as many fish as we can.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're really excited about
today as well, aren't you?
<PAGE>
I'm also ready and raring to go.
I'm really going to take it seriously.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have to put in some extra effort
sometimes to remind you of just
how great I am.
<PAGE>
Let's both do our best
to catch as many fish as we can.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel really confident about 
my fishing.
I wonder if I can beat you this time.
<PAGE>
Sometimes I want to show that I am also
a capable husband, so
maybe I should go straight to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So then, <MYNAME>.
Be on your guard.
Heh heh heh.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The other day when I was fishing,
I caught a very strange piece of paper.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I just threw it back into the water
but now that I think about it,
it might have been a blueprint.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I completely lose track of time
when I fish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>When I am catching a major haul,
I just can't drag myself away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>When I don't catch anything,
I end up saying "just 5 minutes more,
just 10 minutes more" and so on.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>And then I notice it's already dark.
That can happen when you get caught up.
Be careful of it during the competition.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I am really looking forward to your
performance in the fishing event.
Let's both do our best.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, take care of yourself in the
contest. Don't hurt yourself
on the fishing hook or anything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It would be
such a pity if you
injured your beautiful hands.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>We should both try to stay safe
and enjoy fishing together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do your best
to catch lots of fish.
<PAGE>
As your husband, I'll try
my very best not
to make you ashamed of me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hopefully we can both give it our all
and achieve victory
together as a couple.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fact that
there are a lot of fish in the river
is the proof that the water is clean.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>A town with lots of fish in its river
is also a town that enjoys clean water.
That is really wonderful.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For Amir and I,
fishing is something
we don't do very often.
<PAGE>
We bred various fish back at the estate,
but all of them were ornamental.
I couldn't catch any.
<PAGE>
There are many of places
to catch fish in this town and
this event has been put on specially.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Amir and I
both find it fascinating.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fishing?
I like it because it's relaxing and 
you can do it at your own pace.
<PAGE>
Anyway, with that in mind, 
let's do our best.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is good to be enthusiastic but
be careful not to get pulled
by the fish and fall into the river.
<PAGE>
I suppose your skills must be good
seeing you're a farmer
and all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But you're still, umm...a woman,
after all, don't do anything reckless.
And call me if you need me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fishing is troublesome but,
if you give it your all,
I'll do my best as well.
<PAGE>
We may be a couple,
but I won't go easy on you.
<PAGE>
May the best angler win.
So don't start crying if you lose, OK?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am strong from taking care of animals.
I feel confident enough in
my strength to catch fish.
<PAGE>
So, even if I catch a big one, I don't
think it'll be able to get away from
me.
<PAGE>
I know the biggest fish wont win the
contest, but since it's a special
occasion, I'd like to catch a big one.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Obviously, the kind of fish you can
catch varies according to the place.
<PAGE>
It is boring to catch the same
kind of fish again and again.
<PAGE>
Isn't it good
to try casting your line
in different places?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fishing? I am not sure
if I can catch any, but anyway,
let's do our best to catch lots of fish.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I actually feel uncomfortable about
having to compete against you.
<PAGE>
But going easy on each other because
we're lovers would be disrespectful
to our competitors and the spectators.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll do everything I can
not to let you beat me.
<PAGE>
Let's do our best
to catch lots of fish!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Areas next to a river
are always dangerous.
Please pay attention.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Also, be careful not to get hurt
when putting the bait on the fishhook.
<PAGE>
What? Do I sound like your parents?
Oh, I am sorry.
That wasn't my intention.
<PAGE>
But it's only natural for a husband to
worry about his wife's safety,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
Just be careful not to get hurt,
and let's enjoy the Fishing Fest.
It would be nice to catch lots of fish.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's amazing how you can
catch the fish swimming in the river
just with a rod.
<PAGE>
I wonder if there's any knack
about how to apply strength
or bait the hook.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The more I learn about fishing,
the more interesting
it becomes.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There is something called fishing bait
that is a convenient item for fishing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If I had some bait,
I could attract the fish to me
and catch lots of them.
<PAGE>
I would really like to
give it a try in this competition,
but I wonder how effective it would be.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>!
Let's try our best in the Fishing Fest!
OK, let's catch lots of fish!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll be out there to win!
You try your best, too.
I'm rooting for you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, but how nice it would be
if both of us could win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Glorious Couple's Double Victory!
I can just picture the headline. Now
that's an article I'd like to write.
<PAGE>
A newspaper with an article like that
would certainly be
an amazing keepsake.♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go for victory
and catch lots of fish!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Don't hold back because we're a
couple. Let's not get jealous, whoever
wins. Let's have a good time.♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fishing is fun!
And this is special occasion,
so I want to catch lots of big fish!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hmm... But if they are too big,
maybe I won't be able to 
pull them out by myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, if you're by my side when I get
a big one and I look like I'm troubled,
please help me pull it up!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I once wrote a feature article
about the places to catch fish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So I have done lots of research about
the best places to catch fish.♪ Great!
I'm aiming to catch lots of fish!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, good luck in the
Fishing Fest.
I'll be rooting for you. ♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good luck in the Fishing Fest!
I'm sure you can catch
lots of fish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But it is dangerous around the river.
Be careful not to get hurt.
<PAGE>
If you got hurt,
I'd be so sad
that I might cry.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're so great!
Don't let me down!
I'm supporting you. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But don't bring home
the fish you catch.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Why? 
You must know the reason why.
It is mean to pretend you don't know.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I can't stand raw fish.
They have a strange smell
and they're all slimy.
<PAGE>
I'm worried you will catch to many
fish. If you can't carry them all,
ask somebody to help you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fish spoil very quickly.
Even if you catch a lot
, they cannot be used for magic.
<PAGE>
If I do catch lots of fish,
it would be hard to bring them all home,
so I plan to release them.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It would be fun to catch lots of fish.
If we catch a lot,
I will makes some dish for dinner.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
There's something I want to tell you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Well...with you...I feel that...
events in this town...are more enjoyable
than ever before... But why?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>... ... <MYNAME>?　What's up?
Did I say something wrong?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It would be so nice if we
could catch lots of fish together.
Let's try our best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But if we catch too many, would we
be having fish for meals every day?
I don't think I could take that.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Many people say they don't like fish
because fish are slimy.
My mom's like that, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I wonder why fish are slimy.
If they weren't,
everybody would like them.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me tell you about Dunhill.
<PAGE>
He said that it's better to let go
of the rod if the fish is pulling
so hard that you can't pull it up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>So you don't get pulled into the river.
Are fish really that fierce?
It's a little scary.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't have much experience fishing,
so I'm not sure how many I can catch,
but I'll do the best I can.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's both do our best
to catch as many fish as we can.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you confident 
about fishing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If you are confident,
I wonder if we could
go fishing together next time?
<PAGE>
I feel that under your guidance
I could improve my skills very fast.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I will not cause you any trouble.
I promise.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It might not be appropriate to say,
but I would really like to
spend more time with you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As a couple...I mean...Because we are,
we need private and public lives.
That's why we compete with each other.
<PAGE>
I may not be a good rival
for you but still
I will do the my best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's do our best
to catch lots of fish.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The person who first came up with
fishing must have been pretty smart.
<PAGE>
Passing a line along a rod and fixing
a hook with bait to catch the fish.
I think that idea was really good.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When I think that we have now inherited
the skill to fish for ourselves,
I feel so impressed.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just like farm tools, where there
are common and improved hoes,
there are different kinds of rods.
<PAGE>
If you  plan to catch lots of fish,
I suppose you should also choose the rod
according to the place.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Clement has promised that he will
cook some delicious fish dishes for us
if we can catch lots of fish.
<PAGE>
I will do my best for those 
delicious fish dishes!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go for victory
and catch lots of fish!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, let's not be jealous,
whoever is the winner.
But I won't lose!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, let's catch lots of fish
together!
<PAGE>
If you can catch lots of fish, 
I'll use them to prepare lots of 
delicious fish dishes for you. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>A banquet of fresh fish dishes...
Heh heh heh, I can't wait! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't have much fishing experience.
I wonder
if I can do it well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Anyway, I have to try!
I'll do my best ♪

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you hook a fish, you must be quick,
pull up the rod a lot in a short time.
If not, it will escape very quickly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But How can I
pull up the rod many times
in a short time?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>What?　Urgh!!
... Something like this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>... Oh, I see!　Oh, no!
The fishhook
got caught in my clothes!
<PAGE>
He-help me please...
Uh, fishing is difficult.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fishing?
It may be a bit of trouble,
but it's not bad doing it sometimes.
<PAGE>
It may be a good idea once in a while,
and cook the fish you catch for dinner.
Anyway, let's do our best.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got a wonderful idea 
for what you can do 
if I win the Fest ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You can be the guinea pig
for my pharmaceutical experiment.
How about it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What?　And if you win?
How about...I have to 
go on a date with you? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I bet you would be so happy
if you could date with me.
Make sure you give it your all.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's OK
to be enthusiastic, but please
be careful not to get hurt.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>You can be careless sometimes.
I worry you may fall
straight into the river.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Don't make fun of me, OK?
I am just showing you how much I care!
Understand?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If so, please listen to what I say
and be careful.
Right, let's catch some fish!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
... Maybe I should put all the
fish I catch into a spring.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Not a bad idea, if I do say so myself!
I can just imagine a spring
full of fish flapping around ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, I would like to catch
a fish so big
that everyone will be impressed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That would be a piece of cake
if we could use magic.
It is annoying that magic isn't allowed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Never mind.
I'll catch a big one without magic.
That's for sure.
<PAGE>
If you feel like it, we could compete
to see who can catch the biggest fish.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
Aren't you a bit too relaxed?
<PAGE>
You must feel very confident
about fishing, right?
<PAGE>
I'm looking forward to see
how many fish
you can fish.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It might be a good idea
to keep an eye out for fishing tips.
Using fishing bait would be a good idea.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It all depends on the mood of the fish.
Sometimes they bite sometimes they don't
The best thing is to sit still and wait.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoever catches the most is the winner.
There are small fish, big fish
and all sizes in between..
<PAGE>
But even if you catch a big one,
it still counts as one.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How do you feel about fishing?
I'm feeling pretty confident.
Good luck to both of us.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't talk too much while you're
fishing. Everyone's looking at the
river and coming up for a strategy.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops, we can talk about fishing later.
The competition has already started.
<PAGE>
I hope it will be a good match.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just now, Hina told me that
the area around a river is dangerous.
Please take care when you are fishing.
<PAGE>
We should be careful not to get hurt,
and enjoy the Fishing Fest.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the Fest, the number of fish
you can catch is very important.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But it is a special occasion.
I would like to catch
some big fish or rare fish.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it comes to fishing,
Charles is better than me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Normally
I don't fish, so I don't feel
confident about winning this Fest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Seeing as I'm taking the time
to participate, I'll do my best to win.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fishing?
I am not very confident about that
but I have to try my best to win!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, you also try your best.
I'll be rooting for you ♪

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Fish are so slimy.
I don't like touching them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I also feel bad about taking them home.
I'll release them after I catch them.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My dad is really good 
at fishing ♪
<PAGE>
Dad will win the Fest 
for sure!
<PAGE>
I have to try my best not to 
lose to Dad!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not very good at fishing.
<PAGE>
But never mind. Let's both try our
best. I've come this far. There's no
way I'm going to lose.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
For fishing, you have to sit down
for a long time, right?
I'm not very good at that.
<PAGE>
Being too relaxed
would make you feel sleepy, wouldn't it?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is an important Fest,
and I'm part of it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Although I'm very busy with work.
I might not have time for fishing.
Toni must have the biggest advantage.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If he was in the mood, 
he could spend all day fishing 
from morning to night.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right!
I'm going to catch lots of fish!
<PAGE>
I'm not going to lose 
even to you!
I will be the winner!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...
I wonder where should I go fishing.
Over there? Or...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>What, <MYNAME>?
I don't want to think that
you plan to take my spot do you?
<PAGE>
That is impossible!
Find one yourself!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you can imagine, Kosaburo seems
to be the strongest competitor.
<PAGE>
But I won't lose!
Right, my goal is 100 fish!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not that I hate fishing, but you
see? I am a doctor. I can't idle away
an entire day like you.
<PAGE>
I can't really be expected to win
under such unfavorable conditions.
I'll just have to go and try my best.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not interested in who wins or
loses. I just enjoy the good feeling
of spending a day by the river.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It wouldn't be much asking me about
fishing. Tell me if you know if there
are any good spots for catching fish.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah?
Oh, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Do your best to catch
lots of fish.
I'm rooting for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I... err...
I'll also try to catch some.
I'll do what I can.　...... Ah.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm completely fine with
looking at fish
and even eating them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But raw fish...
It's all slimy and gross.
I can't stand it.
<PAGE>
So even if I catch some, 
I won't be touching any of them.
... What can I do?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm only taking part in the Fest cause
I want to have a good time with
everybody.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But if possible,
I would like to support you all.
... Ah.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not very good at fishing,
but let's do our best.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like we're going to be
eating fish for some time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Meuniere, carpaccio, bouillabaisse...
So many delicious dishes.
I can't wait.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After all, the favorite to win the
Fishing Fest is Kosaburo. He is really
an expert when it comes to fishing.
<PAGE>
... That's not quite right...
He all he thinks about is fishing...

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you talking about?
Victory is mine for certain.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Has the match already begun?
Don't speak rubbish.
I need to start thinking about fishing.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, tell Mum! We're going to have
fish dishes for three days. This victory
is going to be a walk-over for me.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I haven't fished for a long time.
If it wasn't for this type of event,
I wouldn't really fish at all.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>,
let's do our best.
